title: Michael Vanthourenhout Doubles up at European Championships in Difficult Conditions
content:
The Belgian never had a big gap after going early in the race, but held on in torrid conditions. Cameron Mason takes silver for Britain with Lars van der Haar in third.

Read the full article at Michael Vanthourenhout Doubles up at European Championships in Difficult Conditions on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
